TopicTitle: Testing engine or parts in Career Mode

Articles.Content:
[http://s14.postimg.org/ek4rb3oox/screenshot1.png](http://s14.postimg.org/ek4rb3oox/screenshot1.png)

I did this contract, I landed my vessel, recover the vessel and the contract still 'incomplete'. Is this kind of bug? I am trying to get trough all Career Mode ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Ah, did you activate the part through staging while all checkmarks were green? The checkmarks only indicate that you've met the parameters for running the test, but you still have to run it.
I can't see, but if it's an engine, you could try shutdown then activate.

Also right click onthe engine, see if there's a 'Test Component' option.

Wemb
